data.disc: file name of experimental data source

preAntStr.disc: filename for base model we are parameterising

antStr.disc: filename for model with multiple parallel submodes

elemOut.disc: file containing data about the named elements composing the base model and derived models used for parameter estimation

TCOutputs.disc: time course simulations for the first few 'best' parameter sets in the parameter estimation

DBOutputs.disc: time course simulations for the first few 'best' parameter sets in the parameter estimation done using the same model used for parameter estimation. used for debugging

methP.disc: the method and parameters used in the first phase of parameter estimations

methS.disc: the method and parameters used in the second phase of parameter estimations

dataName.disc: folder name used to identify output data and figures

id.disc: identifier used to distinguish output sets in the same folder and allow parallel execution of different parameter estimations

copys.disc: number of parameter sets in estimated output

stabAlow.disc: time allowed for model to stabilise
